product_name: CamelBak Magic Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: The women's CamelBak Magic hydration pack sports a gender-specific design for excellent comfort, plus gear storage and a 70 fl. oz. reservoir for quick mountain biking sessions.
short_description: The women's CamelBak Magic hydration pack sports a gender-specific design for excellent comfort, plus gear storage and a 70 fl. oz. reservoir for quick mountain biking sessions.
